title: Lin Chiling Welcomes Son in 2022, Puts Family First and Reveals Filming Plans - World Today News
text:
Lin Chiling She and her husband AKIRA welcomed the birth of their son in early 2022. As a mother, she puts family first. about the development of his personality. Although she has not appeared on the big screen in 5 years, she still cares about films after her return to the Golden Horse Awards last year, she was invited to attend the opening ceremony of the 14th International Film Festival Beijing tonight (4/18) For this reason, she expressed her gratitude to the son and his mother-in-law “requested leave” for four days, in fact, it was the longest separation between mother and son.
Lin Chiling, who was a guest at the opening ceremony of the Beijing Film Festival, arrived early for his rehearsals at the gate for several days. put it in.” She thought her son’s answer was very cute.
For Lin Chiling, “four days is the maximum” for mother and son to be separated because AKIRA is also on tour, she first submitted to her mother-in-law, “I will take over her affairs – out when my mother-in-law. – I can do it. When she is well, I will take over the affairs outside.
After arriving in Beijing, Lin Chiling FaceTimed her son every day. “I said ‘I’m in Beijing’! He can talk very well now. And he can still say ‘Mum’s so cute’. He’s the only one who likes to hear me sing .”
Lin Chiling rarely asks her son’s permission.Provided by Lin Chiling Studio
The 2-year-old son is not afraid of life, lively and active. He is not only independent, but also loves to interact with adults, however, he is still as the most attached to his mother, Lin Chiling said sweetly that he likes to eat a lot.
Not only does her son cling to her, Lin Chiling also enjoys every moment of mother and son getting along. “From the time the child was born until now, we have been together every day. Daily conversations can also be used as teaching materials” As a result, he has more knowledge about this letter, and can he learns quickly through game teaching.”
Claiming that he was a good player, Lin Chiling said with a smile that her son likes to play the doctor’s visit game. even happier.” She also praised AKIRA as a great teammate, “People say parenting is a relay race. None of us is particularly strong in one part. We are teammates who work well together. The man is very talented. Recently he made some toys out. of cardboard boxes.
There are still many job offers and interesting projects. If your sister shows up, you can give her a gift.” Warm and happy little words, I’m there.” When will you return to the film industry? She said that she is not usually addicted to drama, but “I am addicted to watching movies for a long time, so that she can only wait until her son grows up.
